title: Radio 1 Established 1967 CD
description:
The compilation album Radio 1 Established 1967 is a collection of covers especially recorded for Radio 1 by a number of artists. The album celebrates the 40th anniversary of BBC Radio 1. There are forty songs recorded by forty different artists (a little bit more than forty, since there are some duets). Each artist was given a year, and were allowed to cover a song from that year. The only exception to this was the Kaiser Chiefs ÃƒÂ¢?? since they were given 1967, they had to cover Flowers In The Rain by The Move, which was the first song played on Radio 1. The album was released on October 1, 2007.

It is to be noted that not all the years correspond to the original year of release, e.g. 1968, 1987, 1990, 1991 and 1992. The songs were however remixed and/or re-released in those years, so the fudge factor fits
